reviews.review: В последнее время играть стало просто невозможно. Очень много читеров.
Гавной воняет прям в меню, не рекомендую.
Классная игра, правда говно полное. Мне нравится, но играть не советую.
If you like to get killed by russian hackers, you should play this game.

An overall pretty nice game I actually still enjoy to play with my friends. But it has become boring to face a whole team of enemy cheaters and just never get up from Silver so I actually can play against good people. I keep getting banned for 1 whole ****** day just because I kicked too many people who were griefing and destroying our game. Can't give a positive review until those things are fixed.
